alert.note: Alert for Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 10:43PM AKST until January 21 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...FRONT CONTINUES TO MOVE ACROSS THE PANHANDLE Cooler air remains in place at higher elevations with accumulating snowfall expected through Saturday morning. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 1-3 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Along the Klondike highway. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Friday afternoon snow estimates from the area range from 1 to 3 inches with the higher estimates closer to the border.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
